entry.summary: Introduction ğŸƒğŸ½â€â™€ï¸ One of the best next steps you can take on your Python journey is diving into concurrency & parallelsim. Many developers will often learn enough to get by, but you can spend your entire career in this space! There are a lot of exciting things to learn, but newcomers can often feel intimadated by the steep curve. In this series of short posts I am hoping we can distill these topics so you can start writing more performant Python ğŸš€ğŸ
